data.name: Corporate Package
data.description: At our resort, we offer an outstanding corporate retreat package that is perfect for any size business.

data.name: Day Long Package
data.description: Fill your weekend with thrill and excitement with the luxury facility of our 5-star resort near Dhaka.

data.name: Honeymoon Package
data.description: Summertime is finally here and what better way to celebrate than by taking your loved one away for a romantic getaway?

data.name: Family Package
data.description: When looking for family fun, many resort guests think of the typical things like swimming pools, water parks and amusement rides.
